data.text: @DavidCOJ102 @MyJRA Why only in certain areas? It seems like some councillors take their job seriously, while others don't.
@MyJRA @DavidCOJ102 Went past today,  pothole still there
@gus9mmJHP @DavidCOJ102 Hi, kindly note that service request #4092514 was successfully created. Thanks, ^HM
@jacquie_walls @MyJRA Not a City issue. Provincial intersection. Total mess currently with handover.
@DavidCOJ102 @MyJRA Huge pothole on Leslie by Westway in Douglasdale Fourways

@DavidCOJ102 @MyJRA Can u assist with robots being out of order for nearly 3 weeks. Malibongwe and President Fouche. Intersection is dangerous as it is and with no robots, makes it a nightmare. Some is going to get seriously hurt!
@Marttwit @DavidCOJ102 @MyJRA Need some bollards deployed to stop taxis and tow trucks using the islands too
@yakballs @DavidCOJ102 @MyJRA I have asked team to attend to that. Today they were working  their way up William Nicol from 2nd Rd Hyde Park.
@DavidCOJ102 @MyJRA Intersection of Jan smuts and WN at Hyde park looks abysmal too â€¦. Maybe City Parks too ?
